options.fig-cap: Comparison of the appearance ratings for yogurt from three vendors. Color is used to distinguish ratings from the same participant.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-11

options.tbl-cap: ANOVA table summarizing the comparison of the appearance ratings of frozen yogurt across three vendors from the Frozen Yogurt Case Study.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-14

options.fig-cap: Plot of the residuals against the predicted values from a model comparing the appearance ratings across yogurt vendors accounting for subject-variability.
options.fig-alt: Scatter plot of residuals against predicted values revealing no trend in the spread of the residuals.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-17

options.fig-cap: Normal probability plot assessing the assumption that the errors for our model comparing the appearance ratings across vendores follow a Normal distribution.
options.fig-alt: Plot of the sample quantiles against the theoretical quantiles from a Normal distribution; the plot exhibits a linear trend.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-18

options.fig-cap: Analytical model of the null distribution of the standardized statistic computed from the Frozen Yogurt Case Study comparing the appearance rating of frozen yogurt across three vendors.
options.fig-alt: Density plot of the null distribution of the standardized statistic; a red dashed line represents the observed standardized statistic, and the p-value is overlayed.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-20
